org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.http
Class HttpRestProviderForPush

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.http.HttpRestProviderForPush
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpProvider
public class HttpRestProviderForPush
extends Object
implements HttpProvider

This is a stopgap class to provide HTTP Basic Authentication until we move Authenticator support to the HttpProvider level.
